category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Selection Criteria
preference.preference_description: Sets the criteria used for pre-selection of attachments for Item Revision objects for Check-in/Out in the Explore Dialog. For example, for the below case, all the objects of type UGMASTER having a IMAN_specification relation with the Item Revision object will be pre-selected in the Explore Dialog. Valid values are in the format TypeInternalName followed by 10 spaces and then, RelationInternalName. At all times, one of the two preferences "Selection Criteria" or "Select IR" must be set, otherwise the "Check-In/Check-Out" of Item Revision objects will not work. However, this preference's values take precedence over values of these other two preferences. If this preference is not set and "Select IR" preference is set ,then only the Item Revision objects are selected and not their attachments.
